content: the fairy village of cypress knee is famous for its bright colored doors little folk travel far and wide to take photos near their favorites these thumb-sized fairy doors are a super quick knit they are knit in the round on dpns because they have a front and a back they don t need blocking their wooden frames and brass door knobs are done with simple embroidery i hope you enjoy this free pattern happy knitting natasha > **praise for colorful fairy doors** > > fun very quick and easy project > minnistitcher 1 > > super quick well written w/ links to > embroidery tutorials > randyratcraft 2 > > quick knit bonewoman 3 > > a very quick cute little knit > bogwoppit 4 > > this is a very quick fun project > omissi 5 > > i m glad to have a door anywhere > especially in spring i feel like > there are fairies everywhere even i > completed it in less than 30 minutes > it could have been earlier > mirihi 6 > > such a tiny little door made for > fairies only saphiera 7 > > a wonderful pattern that is very quick > to knit and leaves room for your own > embellishments > kleinesundfeines 8 1 https //www ravelry com/projects/minnistitcher/fairy-door-test 2 https //www ravelry com/projects/randyratcrafts/colorful-fairy-doors 3 https //www ravelry com/projects/bonewoman/fairy-door-test 4 https //www ravelry com/projects/bogwoppit/fairy-doors-test 5 https //www ravelry com/projects/omissi/colorful-fairy-doors 6 https //www ravelry com/projects/mirihi/colorful-fairy-doors 7 https //www ravelry com/projects/saphiera/colorful-fairy-doors 8 https //www ravelry com/projects/kleinesundfeines/little-fairy-door
